actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow the deduction for percentage depletion (other than with respect to oil and gas wells) to the shareholders of a subchapter S corporation in lieu of allowing such deduction to the corporation.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow the deduction for excess percentage depletion (other than with respect to oil and gas wells) to the shareholders of a subchapter S corporation in lieu of allowing such deduction to the corporation.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow the deduction for percentage depletion (other than with respect to oil and gas wells) to the shareholders of a subchapter S corporation in lieu of allowing such deduction to the corporation.
